thread.title: All-Metro Players of the Week – Week 7
thread.title_full: All-Metro Players of the Week – Week 7

title: All-Metro Players of the Week – Week 7
text:
All-Metro Players of the Week – Week 7 Ethan Bernal , Montgomery Advertiser 4:55 p.m. CDT October 4, 2015 Buy Photo Prattville running back Kingston Davis runs under pressure. The visiting Prattville Lions defeated Jefferson Davis 38-20 on Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, at Cramton Bowl in Montgomery. (Photo: Shannon Heupel/Advertiser) Buy Photo 2 CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
This weekend was a great one to be a receiver, as two were selected as the Advertiser All-Metro Players of the Week. See who made the list for Week 7 (Oct. 1-3). 
Class 5A-7A 
Kingston Davis, RB, Sr., Prattville 
Davis set career highs with 38 carries for 277 yards and three touchdowns in the Lions’ 38-20 win over Jeff Davis. Davis has run for at least 145 yards and a touchdown in his last five games. 
Prattville (5-1, 2-1 Class 7A, Region 2) travels to Enterprise (2-4, 0-3) on Friday. Buy Photo 
Trinity's Robert Adams carries against Montgomery Academy at the Montgomery Academy campus in Montgomery Al. on Friday September 25, 2015. (Photo: Mickey Welsh / Advertiser) 
Class 1A-4A 
Robert Adams, WR, Sr., Trinity 
Adams caught 10 passes for 136 yards and three touchdowns in the Wildcats’ 35-0 win over Ashford. It was his third game this season with at least five catches, 125 yards and three touchdowns. 
Trinity (4-3, 3-1 Class 4A, Region 2) hosts Catholic (3-1, 1-3) on Friday. Buy Photo 
Edgewood's Jackson Tate (3) carries for a touchdown in the first quarter against Macon East at the Macon East Academy campus in Cecil, Ala. on Thursday October 1, 2015. (Photo: Mickey Welsh / Advertiser) 
AISA 
Jackson Tate, WR, Jr., Edgewood 
Tate caught six passes for 126 yards and three touchdowns, all in the first half of the Wildcats’ 49-0 win over Macon-East. Tate now has 11 touchdown catches for the season. 
Edgewood (7-0, 4-0 Class AA, Region 2) hosts Northside Methodist (5-1, 2-1) on Friday. 
*The All-Metro Players of the Week are selected based on Advertiser game coverage and statistics submitted by team coaches 2 CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://on.mgmadv.com/1LcvSKk TOP VIDEOS
